title: Edit Audio for a Podcast
description: A podcast producer needs to edit a recorded interview, removing mistakes, long pauses, and 'ums' and 'ahs'.

tasks.description: Listen through the raw audio recording, making notes of edits that need to be made.
Cut out any mistakes, stumbles, or long pauses to make the conversation flow better.
tasks.expected_outcome: The audio is tightened up and flows more smoothly.

tasks.description: Apply audio processing like noise reduction and equalization to improve the sound quality.
tasks.expected_outcome: The final audio is clean and easy to listen to.

tasks.description: Add intro/outro music and any other sound effects.
tasks.expected_outcome: The final podcast episode is mixed and produced.
